post.title: Julianna Barwick – The Magic Place
post.content: The Magic Place is a place for contemplating life from a tranquil point of view with music that brings comfort and hope. Barwick’s wordless harmonies of layered angelic voices are achieved by multi-tracking her voice through a loop station. Her inspiration for this album is the a-capella church hymns she grew up singing, and such melodies are embraced here to a great extend.

fragmentData.html: The Magic Place is a place for contemplating life from a tranquil point of view with music that brings comfort and hope.
